alert.note: Alert for Luzerne (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 09 at 10:10AM EDT by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southern Luzerne County through 1045 AM EDT... At 1010 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Drums, or near Hazleton, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Hazleton, West Hazleton, Freeland, Ashley, Dorrance, Conyngham, Slocum, White Haven, Preston and Sugar Notch. This includes the following highway exits... Interstate 80 between 256 and 273. Pennsylvania Interstate 81 between 143 and 165A and B. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
